chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
filter : forall A : Type, (A -> bool) -> list A -> list A
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX
SetoidList.removeA_filter : forall (A : Type) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (eqA_dec : forall x y : A, {eqA x y} + {~ eqA x y}) (x : A) (l : list A), SetoidList.removeA (eqA:=eqA) eqA_dec x l = filter (fun y : A => if eqA_dec x y then false else true) l
filter_map : forall (A : Type) (f g : A -> bool) (l : list A), filter f l = filter g l < -> map f l = map g l
List.filter_app : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l l' : list A), filter f (l ++ l') = filter f l ++ filter f l'
ext_in_filter : forall (A : Type) (f g : A -> bool) (l : list A), filter f l = filter g l -> forall a : A, In a l -> f a = g a
filter_ext_in_iff : forall (A : Type) (f g : A -> bool) (l : list A), filter f l = filter g l < -> (forall a : A, In a l -> f a = g a)
filter_ext_in : forall (A : Type) (f g : A -> bool) (l : list A), (forall a : A, In a l -> f a = g a) -> filter f l = filter g l
applyEntries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix applyEntries (h : name) (st : raft_data) (entries : list entry) {struct entries} : list raft_output * raft_data := match entries with | [] => ([], st) | e :: es => let (out, st0) := cacheApplyEntry st e in let out0 := if name_eq_dec (eAt e) h then map (fun o : output => ClientResponse (eClient e) (eId e) o) out else [] in let (out', state) := applyEntries h st0 es in (out0 ++ out', state) end : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, name ->...-> list raft_output * raft_data Arguments applyEntries {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _ _ _%list_scope
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
SetoidList.filter_split : forall (A : Type) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence eqA -> forall ltA : A -> A -> Prop, RelationClasses.StrictOrder ltA -> Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eqA (Morphisms.respectful eqA iff)) ltA -> forall f : A -> bool, (forall x y : A, f x = true -> f y = false -> ltA x y) -> forall l : list A, Sorted.Sorted ltA l -> l = filter f l ++ filter (fun x : A => negb (f x)) l
not_empty = fun (A : Type) (l : list A) => match l with | [] => false | _ :: _ => true end : forall A : Type, list A -> bool Arguments not_empty {A}%type_scope _%list_scope
In_filter_In : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (x : A) (l l' : list A), filter f l = l' -> In x l' -> In x l
multi_params = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => {| Net.name := name; Net.msg := msg; Net.msg_eq_dec := msg_eq_dec; Net.name_eq_dec := name_eq_dec; Net.nodes := nodes; all_names_nodes := all_fin_all N; no_dup_nodes := all_fin_NoDup N; Net.init_handlers := init_handlers; net_handlers := RaftNetHandler; input_handlers := RaftInputHandler |} : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, MultiParams base_params Arguments multi_params {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
filter_ext : forall (A : Type) (f g : A -> bool), (forall a : A, f a = g a) -> forall l : list A, filter f l = filter g l
doGenericServer = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (h : name) (state : raft_data) => let (out, state0) := applyEntries h state (rev (filter (fun x : entry => (lastApplied state <? eIndex x) && (eIndex x <=? commitIndex state)) (findGtIndex (log state) (lastApplied state)))) in (out, RaftState.set_raft_data_lastApplied term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output state0 (if lastApplied state0 <? commitIndex state0 then commitIndex state0 else lastApplied state0), []) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params -> forall raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params, name -> raft_data -> list raft_output * raft_data * list (name * msg) Arguments doGenericServer {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
raft_data = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments raft_data {orig_base_params raft_params}
clientId = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (RaftParams0 : RaftParams orig_base_params) => let (_, _, _, clientId, _) := RaftParams0 in clientId : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments clientId {orig_base_params RaftParams}
findGtIndex_removeAfterIndex_i_lt_i' : forall (l : list entry) (i i' : nat), sorted l -> i < i' -> filter (fun x : entry => (i <? eIndex x) && (eIndex x <=? i')) (findGtIndex l i) ++ removeAfterIndex l i = removeAfterIndex l i'
findGtIndex_removeAfterIndex_i'_le_i : forall (l : list entry) (i i' : nat), sorted l -> i' <= i -> filter (fun x : entry => (i <? eIndex x) && (eIndex x <=? i')) (findGtIndex l i) ++ removeAfterIndex l i = removeAfterIndex l i
base_params = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => {| data := raft_data; input := raft_input; output := raft_output |} : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> BaseParams Arguments base_params {orig_base_params raft_params}
filter_app : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (xs ys : list A), filter f (xs ++ ys) = filter f xs ++ filter f ys
argmax_None : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (l : list A), argmax f l = None -> l = []
partition_inv_nil : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l : list A), partition f l = ([], []) < -> l = []
map_eq_nil : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A), map f l = [] -> l = []
null_sound : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), null l = true -> l = []

```coq
intros A l.
induction l.
- reflexivity.
- simpl. destruct (f a) eqn:f_a.
